articles.author: Nathalie Weatherald, Jacopo Barigazzi, Eddy Wax
articles.title: Second crisis Ukraine summit planned for Wednesday - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: More EU leaders, plus Norway and Canada, are expected to attend, 48 hours after previous talks.
articles.content: BRUSSELS European and other world leaders are planning to hold a second emergency summit in Paris on Wednesday as pressure grows to forge a cohesive response to Donald Trump's divisive plan to end th… [+857 chars]

articles.title: Europe's leaders divided over their tactics with Trump - BBC.com
articles.description: Several European countries are furious at feeling they have to dance to the US tune on Ukraine, says Katya Adler.
articles.content:
Nato and European leaders held emergency talks in Paris to discuss the war in Ukraine
French President Emmanuel Macron got straight on the phone to Donald Trump and, separately, to Ukraine's Volodym… [+4758 chars]
